extendedInfo.description: If you are Bad English's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Bad English's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Bad English's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Bad English's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)************************Main Features ************************- Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics************************List of albums ************************- Bad English- Backlash************************List of lyrics ************************- Best Of What I Got- Dancing Off The Edge Of The World- Don't Walk Away- Forget Me Not- Ghost In Your Heart- Heaven Is A 4 Letter Word- Lay Down- Life At The Top- Make Love Last- Possession- Pray For Rain- Price Of Love- Ready When You Are- Rebel Say A Prayer- Restless Ones- Rocking Horse- Savage Blue- So This Is Eden- Straight To Your Heart- The Time Alone With You- Time Stood Still- Tough Times Don't Last- When I See You Smile
